categoryPosts.title: Techstars Day2 - The 3Ws - Who, What, Why
Techstars Day1 - Spare just 1 hour and you can build trust within members
categoryPosts.excerpt: No matter what kind of work the team members are doing, if the team has decided to embrace a new team member, everyone should take a leave for their work at least for 1 hour to openly talk with the newcomer and open themselves up to vulnerability. No excuses whatsoever. The newcomer is a priceless and thankful person to have decided to join the risky startup journey together with the team, and thus, the team should pay their utmost respect to the newcomer.
